QuestData.Title: Getting your Hands Dirty
QuestData.Description: Some of the best fishin' in all of pandaria in this lake right here. I brought enough brew to last me all day, but I didn't think to bring any bait.$B$BWho can really remember such things?$B$BIf you'd be willing to gather me some bait along the shore, I'd be willin' to think on you favorably when it comes time to price my merchandise. Oh, and I'll pay you too, of course. $B$BHow's that sound?
